name: Ball'n'Tower
description:
This project was made with the Godot Game Engine (Mono Version 3.2). It's purpose is to show people how C# games can be made in Godot. Feedback is welcome.

This game is published under the MIT License. You can get the source code on GitHub https://github.com/JupiterRider/ballntower_cs .

W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys to move
Shift to sprint
Control to sneak
Space to jump
Mouse Movement to look around
F to pick up
Click Left Mouse Button to release
Hold Left Mouse Button to power up
ESC to open the menu

A level description can be found in the pause menu .

There are currently only 3 levels available.
